activities.name: Get Config Value in Clound Storage

sqlReaderQuery.value: @concat('SELECT * from ',variables('SCHEMA'),'.CC_CURRENT c WHERE c.LOV_TYPE= ''',variables('lovType'),''' AND c.LOV_NAME = ''',variables('lovName'),''' AND c.ACTIVE_FLG =''Y''')

text.value:
@concat('DELETE FROM ',variables('SCHEMA'),'.CC_TEMP_FILE_DETAIL 
    WHERE FILE_ID IN(SELECT FILE_ID 
                        FROM ',variables('SCHEMA'),'.CC_TEMP_FILE 
                        WHERE STATUS = ''S'' 
                        AND FILE_TYPE = ''',variables('FILE_TYPE'),''')')

activities.name: If Configval is nul or Some Config val is Null

dependsOn.activity: Get Config Value in Clound Storage

expression.value: @or(not(contains(string(activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output),'firstRow')),or(or(or(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output.firstRow.val4,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output.firstRow.val4),null),equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output.firstRow.val1,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output.firstRow.val1),null)),equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output.firstRow.val7,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output.firstRow.val7),null)),equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output.firstRow.val3,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output.firstRow.val3),null)))

ifTrueActivities.name: insert error when config val error

text.value:
@concat('INSERT INTO ',variables('SCHEMA'),'.CC_REVIEW 
	(CREATED,
	CREATED_BY,
	LAST_UPD,
	LAST_UPD_BY,
	REVIEW_TYPE,
	STATUS,
	DESCRIPTION) VALUES (CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	''',variables('CREDIT_USER'),''',CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	''',variables('CREDIT_USER'),''',
	''',variables('REVIEW_TYPE'),''',
	''E'',''',
	if(not(contains(string(activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output),'firstRow')),concat('Config LOV_TYPE : ',variables('lovType'),' ,LOV_NAME : ',variables('lovName'),' Data not found.'),concat('Config ',
	if(startswith(
	concat(if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output.firstRow.val1,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output.firstRow.val1),null),',Input path(val1)',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output.firstRow.val3,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output.firstRow.val3),null),',Prefix Input file(val3)',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output.firstRow.val4,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output.firstRow.val4),null),',file type Input file(val4)',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output.firstRow.val7,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output.firstRow.val7),null),',Move Input path(val7)',''))
	,','),substring(
	concat(if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output.firstRow.val1,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output.firstRow.val1),null),',Input path(val1)',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output.firstRow.val3,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output.firstRow.val3),null),',Prefix Input file(val3)',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output.firstRow.val4,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output.firstRow.val4),null),',file type Input file(val4)',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output.firstRow.val7,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output.firstRow.val7),null),',Move Input path(val7)',''))
	,1,sub(length(
	concat(if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output.firstRow.val1,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output.firstRow.val1),null),',Input path(val1)',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output.firstRow.val3,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output.firstRow.val3),null),',Prefix Input file(val3)',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output.firstRow.val4,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output.firstRow.val4),null),',file type Input file(val4)',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output.firstRow.val7,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output.firstRow.val7),null),',Move Input path(val7)',''))
	),1)),
	concat(if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output.firstRow.val1,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output.firstRow.val1),null),',Input path(val1)',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output.firstRow.val3,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output.firstRow.val3),null),',Prefix Input file(val3)',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output.firstRow.val4,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output.firstRow.val4),null),',file type Input file(val4)',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output.firstRow.val7,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output.firstRow.val7),null),',Move Input path(val7)',''))
	)
	,' Data not found.')),''');')

activities.name: Get All FIle in Config directory

ifTrueActivities.name: insert review process file sync not have input file

text.value:
@concat('INSERT INTO ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_REVIEW 
	(CREATED,
	CREATED_BY,
	LAST_UPD,
	LAST_UPD_BY,
	REVIEW_TYPE,
	STATUS,
	DESCRIPTION) OUTPUT INSERTED.REVIEW_ID VALUES (CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	''',pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,''',CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	''',pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,''',
	''',pipeline().parameters.LOV_TYPE_REVIEW,''',
	''S'',''File prefix : ',pipeline().parameters.prefixInputFile,' data not found in path ',pipeline().parameters.inputPath,''');')

activities.name: If file size equal and Not exist

expression.value: @and(activity('Get File size Dat').output.exists,equals(variables('fileDatSize'), string(string(if(contains(activity('Get File size Dat').output,'size'),activity('Get File size Dat').output?.size,0)))))

ifFalseActivities.name: update file dat data not mapping

text.value:
@concat('UPDATE ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_REVIEW 
	SET LAST_UPD = CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),''')
	, LAST_UPD_BY = ''',
	pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,
	''', STATUS = ''E'',',
	' DESCRIPTION = ''file name data not found/file size no mapping file result ',variables('fileinputName'),'''',
	' WHERE REVIEW_ID =',variables('reviewId'),';')

@concat('UPDATE ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_REVIEW 
	SET LAST_UPD = CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),''')
	, LAST_UPD_BY = ''',
	pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,
	''', STATUS = ''E'',',
	'    DESCRIPTION ''',variables('exceptionError'),'''',
	' WHERE REVIEW_ID =''',variables('reviewId'),''';')

dependsOn.activity: Set For Each File Dat Sizer

activities.name: Set For Each File Dat Sizer

text.value:
@concat('INSERT INTO ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_REVIEW 
	(CREATED,
	CREATED_BY,
	LAST_UPD,
	LAST_UPD_BY,
	REVIEW_TYPE,
	STATUS,
	DESCRIPTION) OUTPUT INSERTED.REVIEW_ID VALUES (CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	''',pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,''',CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	''',pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,''',
	''',pipeline().parameters.LOV_TYPE_REVIEW,''',
	''P'',''Process :',variables('fileinputName'),''');')

@concat('INSERT INTO ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_TEMP_FILE 
	(CREATED,
	CREATED_BY,
	LAST_UPD,
	LAST_UPD_BY,
	FILE_TYPE,
	FILE_NAME,
	FILE_NAME_ARCHIVE,
	FILE_PROCESS_TIME,
	STATUS) OUTPUT INSERTED.FILE_ID  
	VALUES (CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	''',pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,''',CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	''',pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,''',
	''',pipeline().parameters.FILE_TYPE,''',
	''',pipeline().parameters.fileDatName,''',
	''',variables('fileNameArchive'),''',
	''',variables('fileProcessTime'),''',
	''O'');')

@concat('UPDATE
	',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_TEMP_FILE 
	SET LAST_UPD = CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),''')
	, LAST_UPD_BY = ''',
	pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,
	''', STATUS = ''S''',
	', DESCRIPTION = ''Insert data on file update ',pipeline().parameters.FILE_UPDATE_TYPE,' complete''',
	' WHERE FILE_ID =',variables('tempFileDatId'),';')

@concat('UPDATE
	',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_TEMP_FILE 
	SET LAST_UPD = CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),''')
	, LAST_UPD_BY = ''',
	pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,
	''', STATUS = ''E''',
	''', DESCRIPTION = ''', substring(concat('Datafac Exception ',replace(string(activity('Copy data to CC_TEMP_FILE_DETAIL')),'''','''''')),0,499),'''',
	' WHERE FILE_ID =',variables('tempFileDatId'),';')

@concat('UPDATE ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_REVIEW 
	SET LAST_UPD = CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),''')
	, LAST_UPD_BY = ''',
	pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,
	''', STATUS = ''P'',',
	' DESCRIPTION = ''Process file name : ',pipeline().parameters.fileDatName,' total count ',string(length(activity('Lookup FIle Dat').output.value)),' record -> count process ',string(sub(length(activity('Lookup FIle Dat').output.value),2)),' record.''',
	' WHERE REVIEW_ID =',pipeline().parameters.reviewId,';')

@concat('UPDATE ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_REVIEW 
	SET LAST_UPD = CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),''')
	, LAST_UPD_BY = ''',
	pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,
	''', STATUS = ''S''',
	' WHERE REVIEW_ID =',pipeline().parameters.reviewId,';')

@concat('UPDATE ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_REVIEW 
	SET LAST_UPD = CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),''')
	, LAST_UPD_BY = ''',
	pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,
	''', STATUS = ''E'',',
	' DESCRIPTION = ''', substring(concat('Datafac Exception ',replace(string(activity('Copy data to CC_TEMP_FILE_DETAIL')),'''','''''')),0,499),'''',
	' WHERE REVIEW_ID =',pipeline().parameters.reviewId,';')

@concat('DELETE FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_TEMP_FILE_DETAIL '
    ,'WHERE FILE_ID = ',variables('tempFileDatId'),' AND FILE_LINE IS NULL;')
